column5: This BPS-accredited online Health Psychology MSc from Ulster University provides essential Stage 1 Training for aspiring Health Psychologists.Do you already hold an undergraduate or conversion degree in psychology? If so, this programme could be for you.    The Health Psychology MSc from Ulster University is intended for graduate students who seek to enhance their knowledge, skills and awareness of psychological applications to health and illness and pursue professional careers in Psychology.
column9: Two years minimum, four years maximum, part-time
